name: Into the Dating Sim
description:
Lead three heroes on a quest to save the world's restaurants from evil slimes! A tactical dating sim and an RPG.

Created by Jasmine Zhang, Beverly Pan, Jane Lo, and Weylan Wang.

Characters:

Empress Min Kee, the owner of Min Sheng Kee, a world-renowned bakery. Always cheerful and optimistic.

Phynne, a slime that has gained humanoid form. Very edgy.

Count von Vhall, an envoy from a distant land. Is horny.

Features:

  • Fully voice acted dating sim
  • Units gain attack bonuses and special abilities when placed near each other, so move your units strategically
  • Customize and upgrade your equipment

Programmers: Jasmine Zhang, Weylan Wang

Artists: Beverly Pan, Jane Lo

Voice Acting: Beverly Pan, Weylan Wang, Syed Yasir
